channel.title: Changing The Level A Npc Spawns On
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm using a devolution 7.0 server source and i am currently spawning some new npcs into the server. There is a problem when i spawn an npc in autospawn cfg it appears 1 level above what i want it to. How would i fix this?
All help is appreciated
Thanx :)

item.title: Changing The Level A Npc Spawns On
item.dc:creator: @iceyfang iceyfang
item.description:
@iceyfang wrote:

by putting it one level below what you actually want it to be…

mate, if anything, that would be a lot easier. just go with the flow, if it adds a few, subtract a few

Read full topic
item.source: Changing The Level A Npc Spawns On
